channel.title: Äöå?
channel.description:
Since I'm from Finland, and playerbase is always for some reason from scandinavian (very cold area with polar bears, using äöå)
BUt yea... Question: How do I allow letters like: Ä,ä,Å,å,Ö,ö to be used?
317 does not allow dots on top of letters.
